title: Attachment Repair
subtitle: From Insecure to Earned Secure
description: A 6-module course on understanding and healing your attachment patterns. Learn how attachment forms, identify your style, and develop the skills for secure relating.

modules.title: Understanding Attachment
modules.description: How attachment forms and why it matters

whatYouLearn: Understand how attachment patterns form in childhood
Identify your specific attachment style and triggers
Regulate attachment anxiety without seeking reassurance
Open intimacy blocks from avoidant patterns
Choose partners who support secure attachment
Develop earned secure attachment through practice
requirements: Willingness to examine relationship patterns honestly
Openness to changing how you relate
